casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Jacquim LOVELY, a/k/a Jacquin Lovley, Yasim Anderson, Defendant-Petitioner. C-157 September Term 2017
079341 Supreme Court of New Jersey. October 16, 2017

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-004025-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
